New Records: Ausar Thompson became the first player in NBA history to record a statline of 10 points, 10 rebounds, 6 steals, and a perfect 5-for-5 field goal percentage during the Detroit Pistons vs. Minnesota Timberwolves game on 2025-01-05
Key Match Events: Ausar Thompson demonstrated impressive athleticism with a highlight-reel sequence, though the basket was not counted
Cade Cunningham praised Thompson's unique abilities, highlighting his athleticism and defensive impact
Post-Match Reflections: Cade Cunningham expressed admiration for Thompson's all-around skills and his impact on the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thompson's performance marked a unique historical achievement in the NBA
